code:
---
title: "Tolling.Network 2.0 — Transaction Lifecycle"
---
stateDiagram-v2
    [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> TollEvent: Vehicle uses facility

    TollEvent --> TagLookup: Away agency reads tag/plate

    TagLookup --> ChargeCreated: Tag found in TVL
    TagLookup --> PayByPlate: No tag match

    PayByPlate --> ChargeCreated: Plate lookup succeeds

    ChargeCreated --> Submitted: Written to ledger\n(HealthTech_PatientRecords)

    Submitted --> Acknowledged: Home agency confirms receipt\n(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    Submitted --> Rejected: Validation failure\n(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)

    Rejected --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

    Acknowledged --> Posted: Home agency posts\nto customer account
    Acknowledged --> NotPosted: Cannot post\n(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

    Posted --> Reconciled: Home agency writes\nReconciliation record\n(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

    NotPosted --> Reconciled: Home agency writes\nReconciliation record\n(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

    Reconciled --> CorrectionNeeded: Either agency\nsubmits correction
    Reconciled --> Settled: Included in\nsettlement period

    CorrectionNeeded --> Submitted: Corrected charge\nresubmitted

    Settled --> Paid: Off-chain payment\nstatus updated

    Paid --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 这一块。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'。
